short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you study by providing stimulating youtube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a browser extension that allows you to content sludge your feed on any web page that'll allow it. It works by dividing the page in half and then creating youtube videos to go side by side(vertical AND horizontal). This was made purely for fun and is a reference to the idea of content sludge(https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/overstimulation-videos-sludge-content). Please enjoy to the best of your abilities
